data.name: Bear Adventures
data.detailed_description:
Bear Adventures is a 3D platformer with unique graphics!
You can play alone or invite your friends, because in Bear Adventures the co-op mode of the game supports up to 4 players !!

About the game

You are a bear! Weird bear beekeeper! Your enemies have decided to destroy your honey empire!
Go on a journey to bring back honey and punish them! You have to overcome all the trials
and return the stolen honey in order to restore their production.
Don't relax! Attack enemies and collect honey along the way with your friends!
-attack with a blow "Pinwheel"
-cut down trees
-Kill animals
-Pass levels against the clock, and set your records.

Peculiarities
Unique graphics
Many traps
Interesting levels
Level in complete darkness where: the only source of light is a torch, but it does not shine for long, you need to overcome obstacles on the level, find the next torch to reach the finish line.

data.short_description: Go through the levels collecting honey, set a time record, kill animals. In BEAR ADVENTURES you can play with friends, the co-op game mode supports up to 4 players!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 ti or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 22 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 ti or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

highlighted.name: At the beginning of the path
